name: Angry Cat (itch) (Injuryble)
description:
This game was made for the 3 day ScoreJam#24.

It´s a game about a cat that evolves and gets bigger and bigger as it eats  animals and people. 

How to play:

A and D to walk left or right

Avoid certain threats. You only have three lives. 

Eat certain animals and people to get bigger.

Notes:

We used DOTween for the movement.

All Sprites are hand drawn by us.

You have to ACTIVELY walk over the the animals and people. (It´s a bug we couldn`t fix it)

We only managed to integrade an offline highscore system
